name: React Employee Directory
description: This is a React App using 'Random User Generator API' to create an employee directory database; using props drilling technique passing down components and allow users to type an employee's name to search in the database.

name: PWA Budget Tracker
description: This is a MongoDB progressive web app. It has indexedDB and Cache features to store user's data when offline.

name: ORM Eat-Da-Burger
description: This full-stack CRUD application interacts with the users using homemade ORM techniques with MVC flow.

name: MySQL Employee Tracker
description: This command-line app (Content Management Systems) is a MySQL Employee Database Tracker. It allows a business to view, track, add and update employee data.

name: API Weather Dashboard
description: This application uses 'OpenWeatherAPI' and enable users to check the current and 5-day forecast weather for a specific city. The current weather data includes temperature, humidity, wind speed, and UV index. It also sets localStorage and allows the user to save their search history.

name: Random PWD Generator
description: This is a random password generator application. It has 4 password criteria options and let users choose to include lower/upper case, numeric/special characters. The password can be chosen in between 8-128 characters long.
